name: laptop.jpg
description: A portable personal computer with a clamshell form factor.

name: soccer.jpg
description: A sport played by two teams of eleven players with a spherical ball.

name: table.jpg
description: A piece of furniture with a flat top and one or more legs.

name: plantain.jpg
description: A starchy fruit that is typically cooked before eating.

name: clipper.jpg
description: A device used for cutting hair or trimming hedges.

name: banana.jpg
description: A long curved fruit that grows in clusters and has soft pulpy flesh and yellow skin when ripe.

name: umbrella.jpg
description: A device for protection against rain or sunlight, consisting of a collapsible, circular canopy mounted on a central rod.

name: guitar.jpg
description: A musical instrument with six strings played by strumming or plucking.

name: apple.jpg
description: A sweet, edible fruit.

name: elephant.jpg
description: A large mammal with a trunk, tusks, and large ears, found in Africa and Asia.

name: airplane.jpg
description: A powered flying vehicle with fixed wings and a weight greater than that of the air it displaces.

name: balloon.jpg
description: A flexible bag filled with gas, such as helium, which causes it to rise in the air.

name: butterfly.jpg
description: An insect with two pairs of large, typically colorful wings that are covered with microscopic scales.

name: camera.jpg
description: A device for recording visual images in the form of photographs, film, or video signals.

name: dolphin.jpg
description: A highly intelligent aquatic mammal known for its friendly nature and agility in the water.

name: flamingo.jpg
description: A wading bird with a long neck, long legs, and pink or reddish plumage.

name: giraffe.jpg
description: A tall African mammal with a very long neck and forelegs, having a coat patterned with brown patches separated by lighter lines.

name: helicopter.jpg
description: A type of aircraft that derives both lift and propulsion from one or more sets of horizontally revolving overhead rotors.

name: icecream.jpg
description: A sweetened frozen food typically eaten as a snack or dessert.

name: jellyfish.jpg
description: A free-swimming marine animal with a gelatinous umbrella-shaped bell and trailing tentacles.

name: kangaroo.jpg
description: A large marsupial from Australia with strong hind legs for hopping.

name: lemon.jpg
description: A yellow citrus fruit with a sour taste.

name: microscope.jpg
description: An optical instrument used for viewing very small objects.

name: notebook.jpg
description: A small book with blank or ruled pages for writing notes.

name: octopus.jpg
description: A sea creature with eight arms and a soft body.

name: penguin.jpg
description: A flightless seabird with black and white plumage and flipper-like wings.

name: quartz.jpg
description: A hard, crystalline mineral composed of silicon and oxygen atoms.

name: robot.jpg
description: A machine capable of carrying out a complex series of actions automatically.

name: saxophone.jpg
description: A woodwind instrument that is typically made of brass and played with a single-reed mouthpiece.

name: telephone.jpg
description: A device that converts sound, typically and most efficiently the human voice, into electronic signals suitable for transmission via cables or other transmission media over long distances.

name: vaccine.jpg
description: A biological preparation that provides active acquired immunity to a particular infectious disease.

name: watermelon.jpg
description: A large fruit with a hard green rind and sweet watery red or pink flesh.

name: xylophone.jpg
description: A musical instrument in the percussion family that consists of wooden bars struck by mallets.

name: yogurt.jpg
description: A food produced by bacterial fermentation of milk.

name: zebra.jpg
description: An African wild horse with black-and-white stripes and an erect mane.

name: unicorn.jpg
description: A mythical horse-like creature with a single horn on its forehead.
